name: A Mile on the Lost Isle
name_original: A Mile on the Lost Isle
description: I made an “endless” (it’s not really endless it ends after you get 25 points) runner game called A Mile on the Lost Isle. You play as a dinosaur (Tyrone the T-rex) and you jump to try to collect items that come in from the right side of the screen. There are two kinds of items, coins and fruit. The coins just give you points while the fruit fills up the meter in the top right corner. When it is full, you can press Q and your dinosaur will suddenly have a cape and the ability to fly!
